scripts.buildUserjs: webpack --mode development --mono-browser userscript --config webpack.userjs.js && npm run buildBase -- --mono-browser userscript && npm run buildBundle
scripts.buildSafari: webpack --mode development --mono-browser safari --config webpack.safari.js && npm run buildBase -- --mono-browser safari && npm run buildRouter
scripts.buildChrome: webpack --mode development --mono-browser chrome --config webpack.chrome.js && npm run buildBase -- --mono-browser chrome
scripts.watchChrome: webpack --mode development --watch --mono-browser chrome --config webpack.chrome.js --config webpack.background.js --config webpack.pages.js --config webpack.contentScripts.js
